mapper.select: select count(seller_id) cnt from seller where seller_id=#{seller_id};
mapper.insert: insert into seller(seller_id, seller_pwd, company_name, ceo_name, seller_tel, seller_email, seller_website, seller_reg_no, seller_address, seller_status) values(#{seller_id}, #{seller_pwd}, #{company_name}, #{ceo_name}, #{seller_tel}, #{seller_email}, #{seller_website}, #{seller_reg_no}, #{seller_address}, "N")
